introduction: Marvel Super Heroes 4D is a 4D film that was launched at Madame Tussauds London on May 31, 2010.[1] On April 26, 2012, an updated version of the film with a different plot was also opened at Madame Tussauds New York.[2][3][4]A new version of the film with a plot set in Las Vegas was opened at Madame Tussauds Las Vegas on November 20, 2013.[5] Another version Marvel Super Heroes 4D: Avengers Battle in Bali was launched in Bali on November 22, 2013.
